A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film isn't Star Wars\, it's a corporate rehash of Star Wars with no originality\, inspiration or soul to it. An absolute disgrace to filmmaking and the arts in general. Not even 'in a galaxy far far away' is this a real Star Wars film. Utter disgrace. The good thing is\, it highlights further just how fantastic George Lucas' original work is by stark contrast.
